replay,1,joneg002,PIT,welkt901,PIT08,O,N,I,,H $Garrett Jones fly ball was touched by a fan at the top of the wall over the scoreboard; the fan reached over the chain-link fence to touch the ball, which rebounded onto the field; the play was ruled fan interference and Jones was awarded a double; Pirates manager Clint Hurdle asked about the call so crew chief Tim Welke watched the replay and upheld the call

$Juan Uribe's sinking liner was ruled a catch by 3B umpire Mike DiMuro; replays seemed to show that the ball bounced into the glove; Dodgers manager Don Mattingly argued the call with DiMuro and crew chief Tim Welke
